name: Premier Inn Stevenage Central

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights (Fri/Sat) and have never used Premier before. I did book a long time ago and got good rates (total £87). Staff were very efficient, friendly and went that 'extra mile' which was brilliant, considering we didn't check in until around 10pm and were ratty and exhausted! The room was SO comfortable, spotless and the bed fantastic! Good to have branded soap and shower gel too. The room walls were well insulated too (as rather a lot of the guests staying were rowdy, even though there are signs up asking to have consideration!) Breakfast next day was good - the unlimited choice (£7.99) was amazing - branded again (eg: costa coffee), cooked food was hot and fresh, service good. For the price, this stay was exceptional! I don't know if all Premier Inns are as good as this, but we are looking to book again here for next year! Well done!
reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!

reviews.text: Well situated for my meeting, very busy. Breakfast was OK nothing special, but sadly the let down was the bad, sorry rock hard horizontal thing, that I 'slept' on for the night and needed a batht o lossen up in the morning. And top wack against their pricing scales too.
reviews.title: Well situated and pleasant but had to use the sleep guarantee!

reviews.text: Functional, pricey but dissapointing really
reviews.title: Perfect for one night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A perfect place to stay for a short break. Friendly staff, clean room and very comfortable bed. Breakfast more than adequate. Tea making facilities in the room were a bonus.
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: I wouldn' t hesitate to stay here again. Ideal for a one night stay. Rooms were clean and quiet when you consider the proximity of the A1M.
reviews.title: Good Hotel.......but

reviews.text: This stay was a pleasant surprise in that although the price was much cheaper than I ordinarily pay for hotels and guest houses, the service and facilities were excellent. As a single female traveller, I felt safe and comfortable at all times. The welcome and assistance I received on arrival was definitely on a par with other places I have stayed. As I regularly visit family in the area whilst wishing to remain independent, I will definitely be staying there again.
reviews.title: First stay at a Premier Inn

reviews.text: Stayed with family (4 rooms) as we were in the area for a wedding. Can't fault anything - staff were very friendly and rooms were modern and very clean with tea / coffee and shower gel provided which is good. The breakfast deal is great at £7.99 with the cooked portion made to order. We all felt that the hotel and staff were a credit to Premier Inn.
reviews.title: Good quality at a great price!

reviews.text: Good location from major road network, Family friendly and friendly staff, comfortable and fresh modern rooms, very good breakfast. Good entertainment close by with cinema and restaurants. A very good advert for the Premier Inn name and we only paid £19.99 for a family room for the night. We were going to a christening and the check in time of 2pm would have been a problem for getting freshened up and changed but a quick call to the hotel the night before meant that they prepared our room for a 12 o'clock check in, excellent
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: Stayed here after a funeral, at £19 it was excellent value. Room was clean and had everything in it and extra tea and milk was s readily avaliable. The beds were very comfy and even with the window open the road noise was very little. Shower was very good, nice and fast.
reviews.title: Great value, great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly and helpful throughout, especially the breakfast lady. We had the continental which was very nice and lots of choice, the cooked breakfast looked delicious and I would definately have it next time.
reviews.title: Good budget accommodation

reviews.text: Stayed here on Christmas Day whilst visiting relations for Christmas Day. Absolutely no problems whatsoever with the hotel. We didn't plan to use the restaurant, because we didn't need to, however, a nice touch was that the hotel phoned us in advance and advised us that the restaurant was closed on Christmas Day. This shows very good customer relations management - simple thing to do, but do you expect this from a budget hotel in Britain - I certainly didn't. Would recommend the hotel to anyone for a short stay.
reviews.title: First-rate hotel - budget price for excellent facilities.

reviews.text: we arrived very late and were made welcome. The bar was our first stop and reasonably priced. Our room was large and spacious with an excellent extra large bed. Hotel got us a cab to get to the station and our car was safely parked for free at the hotel. Will definately stay here again when wanting to visit London easy to get on and off the A1
reviews.title: Fit for royalty but priced for all pockets.

reviews.text: Stayed at The Premier Inn, Stevenage Herts on Saturday night..17Dec...room was lush, breakfast was yummy only problem they ran out of eggs but they offered a great alternative....3 huge bacon butties... The porridge was soo lovely...plenty of things to add like cranberries, raisins, apricots, dried banana, fresh fruit, lots of cereals and costa coffee...breakfast tea..yum yum
reviews.title: Who'd have thought!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was best nights sleep I'd had in ages..just wish I'd stayed in it a little longer!
reviews.title: Excellent.

reviews.text: We stayed here on our way home from Luton airport, and were very happy.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Good location for us for London, second stay here and rooms and breakfast very good and clean
reviews.title: Great rooms at cheap prices

reviews.text: Although out of the town centre a modern, clean hotel with very friendly staff.
reviews.title: Premier Inn never let's you down

reviews.text: Great value for money, although on business I would also use as a base for leisure.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'll return soon
reviews.title: Very friendly staff

reviews.text: We stayed for a couple of nights whilst visiting relatives in the area and found the Premier Inn to be excellent. Comfortable bed, friendly, helpful staff and a great restaurant gave us everything we needed for our short stay. Very convenient location with its own large car park at no extra cost was a big plus.
reviews.title: Premier Inn is always a good deal

aka: Premier Inn Stevenage Central Hotel Stevenage
